entities.name: detention
entities.description: The detention room where Harry is being held. It has been decorated with lacy covers and cloths, vases of dried flowers, and ornamental plates.

entities.name: dolores
entities.description: Professor Dolores Umbridge, the Hogwarts High Inquisitor. She is wearing a luridly flowered set of robes that blend in with the tablecloth on her desk.

entities.name: moody's
entities.description: The detention room in Moody's days, which was used for detecting wrongdoing and concealment.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter, the main character. He is being held in detention by Professor Umbridge.

entities.name: professor umbridge
entities.description: Professor Dolores Umbridge, the Hogwarts High Inquisitor.

relationships.description: Harry is being held in detention by Professor Umbridge.
The detention room was used for detecting wrongdoing and concealment in Moody's days.
